title: Introducing: Sunboy
content:
Colorado duo Sunboy (comprised of Justin Renaud and Jordan Lempe), come about as fully formed as a new artist can be.

Their debut track, Anxious People, is a wonderfully colourful, psychedelic jam, that’s as open to its pop sensibilities, as it is to the lackadaisical, dreamy moments that litter and characterise it. This impressive track, paired with their press shots that are almost a sly dig at the rigid, predictable nature of most promotional techniques, it’s clear that Sunboy are primed for the big time, whilst without sacrificing either their sense of humour or their creative ingenuity. Check out Anxious People, and hit them up on Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
